name: Pepper Dealer
description:
You are a poor, pepper lover greengrocer.  Try to get the orders right with your tetris shaped peppers. Estimate weight by dropping weights to the other hand of scale.

Controls:

  • A/D or Left/Right arrow keys : Move horizontally
  • W or Up arrow  : Change rotation
  • S or Down : Fall faster
  • Space : Drop weights
  • Enter : Finish order
